message.data: SAFE主网已稳定运行，Bitpie钱包已于7月1日18：00（UTC+8）恢复SAFE收发币等相关功能。

如您有任何疑问，请随时咨询bitpie官方：
官方客服微信号：tingtingwuxu
官方微博：比特派钱包

en.title: Announcement on Resumption of SAFE Sending and Receiving

message.data: The SAFE mainnet has been running stably. Bitpie wallet has resumed SAFE transaction and other related functions at 18:00 (UTC+8) on July 1.

If you have any question, feel free to reach out on:
Telegram: https://t.me/BitpieInternational
Twitter: https://twitter.com/BitpieWallet
